ac: 21, touch 11, flat-footed 18 (+4 armor, +1 deflection, +3 Dex, +6 natural, -2 rage, -1 size)
special_attacks: rage (14 rounds/day), rage powers (superstition +2), rend (2 claws, 1d6+13)
other_gear: chain shirt, amulet of natural armor +1, cloak of resistance +1, ring of protection +1, barbed troll claws*, 130 gp
feats: Intimidating Prowess, Mighty Bite*, Raging Regeneration*, Weapon Focus (claw)
senses: darkvision 60 ft., low-light vision, scent; Perception +11

sections.body:
Before Combat The brute drinks her potion and rages.

Base Statistics When she's not raging, the barbarian's statistics are

AC 23, touch 13, flat-footed 20

hp 109

Fort +17

Will +3; bite +12 (1d8+7), 2 claws +13 (1d6+7); rend (2 claws, 1d6+10)

Str 25

Con 27

CMB +14

CMD 28

Skills Intimidate +11.
sections.name: Tactics

name: Troll Brute
